text: Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“An la wei ta de puren chuangzao de fushi [zhu] he jiamei zhi wu, shei neng jinzhi tamen qu xiangyong ne?” Ni shuo:“Zhexie dongxi shi xinshimen jinshi shenghuo zhong suo gongyou de, shi fuhuo ri [xinshimen] suo du you de. Wo ruci wei you zhishi de minzhong chanming xuduo jixiang.
